title: Holistic Medical | New York Acupuncture
description: holistic medical 46th is an acupuncture clinic made up of holistic practitioners including Acupuncturists, Massage Therapists, Physical Therapists, Aesthetician and Doctor. The clinic can help patients with stress, anxiety, insomnia, neck & back pain, poor circulation, fertility, multiple sclerosis, TMJ, allergies, and more.
cleaned_text: we can provide the best possible treatment for our patients. Yes, we're taking on new customers now! Come in for a consultation.. Our team of doctors, physical therapists, acupuncturists, and massage therapists strive to relieve any pain so that you walk out of our doors feeling satisfied and pain-free. Holistic Medical puts an emphasis on proactivity and actively treats patients to prevent any relapses of symptoms or future illnesses so you, and your loved ones can live a happy, healthy life. Our mission is to provide you with quality holistic care that integrates the best of Eastern and Western medicine. Holistic means we target the underlying root cause of your condition as well as your outward symptoms. All of our doctors and practitioners are licensed and certified in NYS. We can help you with Stress & Anxiety, Insomnia, Neck & Back pain, High Blood Pressure, Sciatica, Pinched Nerve, Poor Circulation, Chronic Fatigue, Migraine, Fibromyalgia, Depression, Fertility Treatments, Plantar Fasciitis, Heel Spur, Whole Body Pain, Multiple Sclerosis, TMJ, Carpal Tunnel Syndrome, Bulging Disc, Herniated Disc, Digestive Disorders, Mortons Neuromas, Allergies and more. Massage is a good form of manipulation of deeper layers of muscle, connective tissue, tendons, ligaments, joints, and even lymphatic vessels. It will soften tight muscles first and then break the knot that has accumulated over time. Our professional staff will revitalize your whole body, mind and soul. It would be a good combination with acupuncture treatment. Importance of physical therapy has rose recently. Physical Therapy helps for sciatica, fibromyalgia, acute/chronic low back/neck pain, sports injuries, plantar fasciitis, and even for preventive purpose for future injuries. We specialize in hands-on manual therapy as well as traditional physical therapy. After seen on TV from Olympic Team USA's hero Michael Phelps' back black marks, we do get lots of inquiries about cupping. It's not something that is a new technique. It's been used in Asian countries for thousands of years. Chiropractors use hands-on spinal manipulation and other alternative treatments, the theory being that proper alignment of the body's musculoskeletal structure, particularly the spine, will enable the body to heal itself without surgery or medication.
